article_title: Suboxone might be the most effective way to beat heroin addiction. So why is it so hard to get?
article_text:
Madison, WI (53711)

Today

Cloudy in the morning, then thunderstorms developing later in the day. High 81F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%..

Tonight

Scattered thunderstorms, especially in the evening. Low near 60F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , suboxone, buprenorphine, methadone, opiate addiction, dane county, todd campbell, richard brown, journey mental health, oxycontin, sue moran, vicodin, cheryl wittke, naloxone, john nygren, peter shumlin
article_metadata.author: Steven Elbow | The Capital Times

og.description: Doctors must get certified to prescribe it. But despite certification training taking only eight hours, few get it.
